name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Funnel Vibe Toolkit: The All-in-One Funnel Design & Funnel Building Toolkit

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design and build better funnels with unique design tools, elements, and resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Funnel Vibe Toolkit Extension is the comprehensive Chrome extension that enhances your funnel building experience. Our toolkit is designed to increase your productivity and creativity when building funnels, designing websites, or creating compelling headline copy.

👉 Created for funnel enthusiasts that build on Systeme.io or High Level. 

------------------------------------------

🆓 Free Tools for All Users:

✅ Shadow Generator: Create custom shadows with adjustable settings
✅ Gradient Generator: Apply gradient effects to sections, rows, and buttons
✅ CSS Animation Library: Use pre-built, customizable animations

🆓 Premium Tools and Resources
To learn more about these premium tools, please visit www.FunnelVibe.com/toolkit or contact support at support@funnelvibe.com with any questions.

------------------------------------------

🎨 Design Tools for Systeme.io users (Premium):

✅ Video Background Generator: Add engaging video backgrounds to any section
✅ Block Elements Gallery: Import pre-designed sections for faster page building
✅ Animated Blocks: Integrate ready-to-use dynamic elements
✅ Carousel Animation Generator: Automate Systeme's native carousel without manual clicks

------------------------------------------

🎨 Design Tools for High Level users (Premium):

Coming Soon...

------------------------------------------

✍️ Copywriting Tools (Premium):

Smart Headline Generators for:
✅ Hero promises
✅ Problem statements
✅ Solution intros
✅ Guarantees
✅ Final CTAs

------------------------------------------

🧮 Productivity Features (Premium):

✅ Affiliate Payout Calculator: Instant estimates based on Systeme.io criteria
✅ Icon Finder Tool (Coming Soon): Quickly find and integrate high-quality icons

------------------------------------------

📚 Resources and Support (Premium):

✅ Resource Hub: Access tutorials, guides, and additional tools
✅ Monthly Updates: Receive new templates and premium resources regularly
Priority Systeme Support (Coming Soon): Get faster, prioritized assistance

🚀 So many new features are coming soon!

------------------------------------------

🤔 Why Choose Funnel Vibe Toolkit Extension?

👉 Systeme.io Specific: Tailored features for the Systeme.io platform
👉 Time-Saving: Streamline your workflow with integrated tools
👉 Regular Updates: Stay current with new features and resources
👉 User-Friendly: Intuitive interface for smooth integration into your projects

💎 Premium Features:
Our premium version offers additional tools and features for Systeme.io users who want to take their projects further. To learn more about our premium features and pricing, visit www.FunnelVibe.com/toolkit.

------------------------------------------

🆘 Need Help? Contact our support team at support@funnelvibe.com for any questions or assistance.
